ValidationRule.description: Check account Name is Unassigned Account when status become resolved .
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Incident" , OR(ISPICKVAL(Status,"Resolved"),ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed")), ISBLANK(Primary_Case_lookup__c), AccountId = $Label.Dummy_Account, Is_Batch_Running__c = False)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This case is currently linked to "Unassigned Account". Please change it to Original Account
